webscript.shortname: Gets the status of an ongoing reset-password request
webscript.description:
This webscript retrieves the status of a specific 'reset password' process.

The response will look like: 

{
  "username" : "joe.bloggs@acme-1317661051429.example"
}
The username response parameter is the user whose password is being reset as part of this workflow. If the id or key within the GET call are not recognised this webscript will return a 404.
